Articles.Content: I installed the mod correctly as the components show in sandbox mode but I only play career mode. Is ISA Mapsat available in career? If so what tier?!
I don't think anybody uses that anymore... try Scansat

Asumeing you didnt find a version updated to .23 and its still the version that was out before career mode was added you would need to edit the parts file to add the line that tells KSP what node it belongs in. I second Renaissance, Dump ISA and try Scansat instead, it actually works out of the box.
